inclusion.criterion: Otherwise healthy subjects on the basis of medical history, physical examination and results of blood tests (complete blood count [CBC], liver function tests [LFT] and renal function tests [RFT])
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to participate in the study and sign the informed consent (by the patient or his/her parent/guardian in case of younger than 18 years)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Duration of lesion more than 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Ulcer size greater than 4 cm in their largest diameter
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of full course of standard treatment (antimonials)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Serious systemic illnesses (as judged by the physician)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Participation in any drug trials in the last 60 days
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 25-year-old pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency and frequency. Physical examination reveals tenderness on palpation of both costovertebral angles.
